reviews.review:
신규 유입이 없다싶이하니 18급~19급 사람들도 썩다 못해 문드러진 게임.
신규 유저가 하기엔 튜토리얼도 생각보다 불친절함.
게임을 하면서 알아가야하는데
생존자로 플레이하면 4명이서 하니 그나마 나은데
살인마로 이 게임을 처음하는 플레이어가 아이템 하나도 안끼고 플레이한다?
추천을 절대로 안함. 생존자 4명이서 엄청나게 괴롭힘.
고인물이 썩다못해 문드러진다는 말을 진짜 온몸으로 느낄 수 있음.


"게임성 자체는 괜찮은데 사람들이 안괜찮다."

-전세계 인성터진 사람들을 모두 볼 수 있는 미친겜

이 한마디로 평가가 됨
พอกลับมาเล่นแล้วแปลกดี

格差マッチとも書かれてるがマッチがなげえ。キラーやってみたいが永遠にマッチしない。ランク上がればそんなことないのか？その上で弱い、不利とされてるキラーを育てて取得するスキルが必須とされてるのでまともな環境でプレイするのにどれほどの時間がかかるのか。
もう少しパークの取得緩くてもいい気がする。攻略サイトに書いてあるオススメスキル全て揃えるのに一体何時間やりこまなければいけないのか・・・
apexと比べると（ダメ？）サバイバーのマッチも長めだし、ロードも長いっす

came back roughly a year later to see if the game's improved.
'Disappointing' would be a massive under-exaggeration.

The developers have gotten worse, the game is now straight P2W, no longer being able to unlock all characters through less than 1 years worth of playtime, and is strife with hackers - mainly wallhacks and speed boosts (a.k.a 'subtle cheating').

The developers are not only completely out of touch with the player-base, as they always have been, but now do so arrogantly and are very petty. Have a decent following and criticize the developers? Welp; hope you like having your cosmetics taken away.

At this point I hope VHS kills DbD and i rarely hope for such things, but these developers don't deserve any of the money let alone attention they get.
---------------------------------------
24 Apr, 2021 @ 9:24pm:

Played wayyyyy back when the game was actually good, quit because lack of (non-DLC) content and toxic developers. Came back to see nothing changed.

You'd think the game would improve over the years and the devs would've got the message after the game 'died' that [b]maybe[/b] actively supporting smurphing, denying the existence of major bugs - which still aren't patched - while also telling you that you just 'need to play better' and releasing no meaningful updates for a base game with far to little content for its asking price is not a good idea.
But yet the cycle continued. Another OP DLC character, just to be 'ballanced' a few weeks later to make room for the next DLC character, then the next, then the next, then the next...all the while the balance of the game got worse and worse until it 'died' leaving only the toxic sweaty tryhards, whales and those in simple denial.
Sadly, the developers are just another breed of Warframe devs; selfish, greedy, egotistical, arrogant and if not then just plain sociopaths. Yet another amazing game destroyed not just by 'micro'-transactions, but a toxic community that the developers actively support and defend.

I wanted this game to be great, I wanted to give it a positive review so I held off waiting for it to get better. Waiting for the developers to actually listen to the majority of the community it once had, but there's nothing left - of value at least.

Sehr empfehlenswertes game...macht viel spaß mit freunden :D

If you play as a survivor, and if the killer performs better than you, chances are, you will feel like he/she/it is bullying you.

Vice versa, if you play as a killer and the survivors play better than you, chances are, you will feel like they are bullying you.

In short: If you like being bullied, this is the game for you. 

p.s: I am not allowing comments for the same reason that i don't look at the end-game chat boxes in DBD.

Fix this Matchmaking. I love playing with my fresh newb friend's. But it's kinda hard to play when they have maybe 2/3 perks that isn't even good. Then has to deal with a rank 2-5 killer with over 500 playing hours in the game. It's one sided as fuck. Fix this bullshit since no fresh players want to deal with this. They can't even play the game they bought because how shitty the MMR is for this game. give me a 10 minute que with a killer our level not a fucking rank 1-5....Who the fuck has a chance when you are so new to the game and get put against decked out killers that are just happy to keep ranking up off easy kills.
好玩 那個下版哪個翻窗那個dhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhohohohoohhoo

Let me start off by saying that I would give this game a neutral feedback, if I could. There's amazing things about the game and then there's things that I really hate about it. It's an extremely mixed bag. 
So, the first problem is the wait. You will be waiting around 15-20 minutes for a 5 minute round. And even longer for the killer. It's unbelievable. When you get into the game, it's super fun, but not worth the wait. Number two, the system for.. literally everything is pretty complicated.. I'm talking about the items, perks(???), offerings(?????), and the Rift. Now, there are games out there that use more complicated systems and that's can be fun when done right, but I think this one doesn't have to be that way. It's a simple concept that could've worked well if it stayed simple. It's like if Among Us/Enemy On Board used something as complicated as this. It doesn't fit. 
Now, that's not to say I don't love this game, as well. When you're actually PLAYING it and not waiting for an hour, it's super fun and addicting (except when you get hanged for the second time and have to mash the space bar). 
Overall, I give this game a 5/10

เป็นเกมที่สนุกมาก (ก ไก่ ประมาณล้านตัว)
 - มีดของ Killer แม่งยาวประมาณ 16.8 เมตร ง้างมีดมาตั้งแต่สมัยอยุธยายังไม่แตกยังโดนกู
 - Perk Dead Hard เป็น Perk ที่โคตรดี เรียกได้ว่าใช้กี่ทีก็หมดกำลังตรงพื้นทุกครั้ง
 - Update Game ทุกครั้งจะทำการเพิ่ม Bug ใหม่ เพื่อเป็นการทรมานผู้เล่นก่อนทำการ Patch แก้ Bug เก่าและเพิ่ม Bug ใหม่เข้าไปในการแก้ Patch
 - เกมนี้ Survival หรือฝั่งผู้รอดชีวิตจะเล่นได้สนุกขึ้นถ้าได้เล่นกับเพื่อน และจะสนุกกว่านั้นถ้าเล่นกับแฟน ว้ายๆไอ้พวกไม่มีแฟน :P

Fun game with steady new content and game patches. However, incredibly unbalanced at the the higher levels of the game. It depends on 1v4 combat, so the limiting factor for matchmaking is killer-based and how many players want to play as killer. However, the developers tend to favor the 'survivors' which discourages players to play 'killer' and therefore negatively impacts matchmaking and the overall player base. Also, in general, the community is incredibly toxic with many streamers openly encouraging toxicity. Huge potential, but the community will likely not improve so be wary.
